pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Luminous Brightening Cream Cleanser 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Olay Regenerist Luminous Brightening Cream Cleanser instantly removes micro-residue including dirt & make-up to brighten skin.

Olay Regenerist Luminous Brightening Cream face cleanser instantly refreshes skin for a brighter appearance by removing micro-residue including dirt & make-up. Gentle exfoliants are specially designed to get rid of dull skin and uncover healthy-looking skin. 

  • Instantly removes micro-residue including even the smallest traces of dirt and make-up to brighten and prepare skin for the rest of your regimen
  • Brightens dull and uneven skin
  • Leaves skin feeling smooth, conditioned, and even textured
  • Hydrates to instantly illuminate skin and recapture skin with youthful luminosity that is highly defined and healthy-looking  
  • Recommended to use before the Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Treatment Essence 30mL and Olay Regenerist Luminous Tone Perfecting Cream Moisturiser for a pearlescent healthy glow

 

 

Find out more at Olay.com.au

Product Claims: Pearlescent Healthy Glow

Size: 100g

KEY FEATURES

• Brightens dull and uneven skin
• Leaves skin feeling smooth, conditioned, and even textured
• Hydrates to instantly illuminate skin and recapture healthy-looking, youthful luminosity

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water.

Ingredients

Water, Isopropyl Palmitate, Petrolatum, Glycerin, Mineral Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Betaine, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Decyl Glucoside, Steareth-21, Alcohol, Lauryl Glucoside, Steareth-2, Fragrance, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.

Directions

Wet face with warm water. Gently massage product over face. Rinse clean with water.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
